amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 631 entitled "Cooperative Research and Development and Special Demonstration Projects for the Uranium Mining Industry".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 109-49 to strike section 631.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (NM) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 225 (Roll no. 124).
